name: The interrogator
description:
YOU are the interrogator and YOU are running through a trap filled town. after you crash into a wall, you wander the streets of an unknown town as YOU go deeper YOU noticed that it is abandoned and places are filled with traps, open doors ready to kill you without notice. You turn around but notice that everywhere looks the same and before you know it you’re lost and you must find a way out before a trap finishes you off.

This is a prototype compatible for computers and tablets, It is in very early production and is a small game.
